I've had this laptop for 5 months and I absolutely love it. Everything about it is decent. Sometimes I go back to my past orders in Amazon just to reflect on the time I put into researching and how happy I am with it. The only thing I notice is the battery life is only a few hours, so I probably wouldn't be productive if I was traveling, but I only use it at home so that doesn't affect me much.

This has to be one of my best investments so far. I am satisfied with how this laptop performs because it seems to work good enough with most tasks you throw at it. It doesnâ€™t freeze after having 10 tabs open with Spotify in the background. It runs GTA V and BeamNG on low settings at 45-60fps. It works smoothly with Photoshop, Blender and other workstations. Its just perfect for light gaming, browsing, editing pictures and more.
I bought this for my wife for general web surfing and video chatting and she loves it. And if you're concerned about Windows S mode, it is easily disabled with 1 click in Settings.
